column5: On the weekend I picked up 2 St.Croix Eyecon Bounce & Troll Rods to replace my old Shimano Beastmaster casting outfit and the wife's old quantum rig. The wife loves to fish as well, so I always have to buy 2 of everything lol!  Anyways, I'm looking for 2 good casting reels with flipping switches 1 left hand 1 right hand. I've kinda of settled on the Quantum Accurist PT from reviews I've read, but I can't find them anywhere.  Anybody know of a store who has the in stock for a decent price?
as far as i know it was discountinued, i believe diawa still makes a flippin switch reel, as does bps
How are the BPS reels for quality.. I never really even concidered them?  I'm looking for aluminum frame, good drag & bearings and a flipping switch.
